body_html:
@skearnes sorry, not sure why I talked about model files 🎱

+1 for this request. I would suggest using lzo for compression as opposed to gzip, as the former allows compressed files to be splittable. There's a reference use of lzo with protobufs in Twitter's elephantbird library.

body:
@skearnes sorry, not sure why I talked about model files :8ball: 

+1 for this request. I would suggest using lzo for compression as opposed to gzip, as the former allows compressed files to be splittable. There's a reference use of lzo with protobufs in Twitter's [elephantbird](https://github.com/twitter/elephant-bird) library.
